name: Mexican Rice Bowl
instructions: Cook rice such that it is tender and the liquid is absorbed
Cut peppers and tomatoes into 1/2 inch piece
Heat oil in a pan on medium-high heat
Add onions and peppers and cook until peppers are tender-crisp, 2-3 minutes
Add garlic and seasoning, stir until fragrant, ~1 minute
Cook beans, broth concentrate, half of tomatoes, half of lime zest and 1/4 cup water until softened, 4-5 minutes
Peal, pit, and scoop the avocado into a medium bowl then mash it up
add lime zest, lime juice, half of cilantro, remaining tomatoes
After rice is done cooking, fluff it up and stir in cilantro
Serve rice, black bean mixture, guacamole, and sour cream
